data.comment: Rhuan (Botafogo) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
Internacional push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Patrick gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
Internacional's Yuri Alberto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo are coming forward and Bruno Nazario gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Internacional have a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Internacional throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Moises (Internacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 20, Thiago Galhardo of Internacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 21, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Internacional's area.
Botafogo pushes forward through Bruno Nazario, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 23, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Goal! A Pedro Raul header gives Botafogo a 0-1 lead in Porto Alegre.
Jose Welison with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Internacional.
Edenilson hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Internacional!
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 31, Internacional push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Rodrigo Moledo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Botafogo defence.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 33, Rodinei (Internacional) gets booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, In Porto Alegre, Patrick of Internacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Moises hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Porto Alegre for Internacional.
Patrick gets an equalizer for Internacional. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 38, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Diego Cavalieri for Botafogo has been booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira and receives a first yellow card.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 40, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 43, In Porto Alegre, Patrick (Internacional) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 44, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 45, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Botafogo's Kevin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Helerson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The first-half has come to a close in Porto Alegre.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 46, Caio Alexandre (Botafogo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 46, Heitor is on a sub for Rodinei for Internacional.
Internacional make their second substitution with Rodrigo Dourado replacing Rodrigo Lindoso.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Internacional.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional's Edenilson has been booked in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 56, Bruno Nazario of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Internacional.
Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Caio Vidal is replacing Marcos Guilherme for the home team.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 62, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Yuri Alberto's header is off-target for Internacional.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 63, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bruno Nazario for Botafogo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Eber Bessa.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 67, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Yuri Alberto puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Kanu (Botafogo) has received a first yellow card.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Patrick with Andres D'Alessandro.
Keisuke Honda for Botafogo drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 77, Attention is being given to Botafogo’s Warley and play has been suspended briefly.
Ramon Diaz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Matheus Barcelos da Silva replacing Jose Welison.
Rhuan (Botafogo) has replaced the possibly injured Warley.
In the minute 79, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Luis is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Caio Vidal (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 85, Keisuke Honda (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Botafogo's Caio Alexandre misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 86, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Peglow is replacing Yuri Alberto for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Peglow is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 88, Pedro Raul for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 89, Peglow has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Internacional.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
In Porto Alegre Botafogo attack through Eber Bessa. The finish is off target, however.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Porto Alegre.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Rodrigo Dourado (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Pedro Raul with Salomon Kalou.
